articles.author: Joyce Peterson, WMC
articles.title: St. Jude scientists make breakthrough and discover possible COVID-19 treatment - WCJB
articles.description: The virus has already claimed 250,000 lives in the U.S. and more than a million worldwide. This week, St. Jude researchers announced they think they’ve discovered a treatment.
articles.content:
MEMPHIS, Tenn. (WMC) - Scientists at St. Jude may have figured out how COVID-19 kills, and more importantly, how to stop it.
